item.title: LeetCode
item.author: Author
item.description: Go Through LeetCode Recursion / Binary Tree 112. Path Sum - simple recursion Discription: Given the root of a binary tree and an integer targetSum, return true if the tree has a root-to-leaf path such that adding up all the values along the path equals targetSum. A leaf is a node with no children. Idea: What kind of traverse should we use?
